Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the Administration for Children’s Services to review strategies and create a plan of action to protect children who qualify for Special Immigrant Juvenile Status.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the Administration for Children’s Services to review strategies and create a plan of action to protect children who qualify for Special Immigrant Juvenile Status.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the Administration for Children’s Services to review strategies and create a plan of action to protect children who qualify for Special Immigrant Juvenile Status.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
